title: Shadow Isles Shyvana - Fan Skin
body:
Hello everyone, as a Shyvana fan I recently made a concept for a new skin idea:
Focussed around the shadow isles, you could call her Ghostfire or Soulfire Shyvana.

replies.body:
Wooooooo spooky. This is awesome and something Shyvana hasn't had before. I can immediately imagine cool green wispy particles for her too.

I like the 'Ghostfire' nod to Ugin >:D

you mentioned Ugin!

that makes me very happy :D
Even though ugin's flames are invisible (what would be bad for clarity)
on his art he has flame. checkmate atheists.

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vzQAXB0u,comment-id=0017,timestamp=2015-03-12T22:48:04.854+0000)
>
> Wooooooo spooky. This is awesome and something Shyvana hasn't had before. I can immediately imagine cool green wispy particles for her too.
> 
> I like the 'Ghostfire' nod to Ugin >:D

If you guys make it, please don't pull a Marauder Ashe or Sweetheart Annie & set its skin-tier too low so we don't get aesthetically cohesive particles!!

This skin deserves those green wispy particles, just as those others did; it's too beautiful!!
1350! I'd pay it
Fucking holy hell yes Underworld Shyvana (to match the Underworld Wukong theme).

> [{quoted}](name=DatPikachuTho,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vzQAXB0u,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-03-12T15:38:54.094+0000)
>
> Fucking holy hell yes Underworld Shyvana (to match the Underworld Wukong theme).

And Underworld TF
Seeing as this skin line already exist, we could call it Underworld Shyana :P. Looks pretty cool. +1
Riot please please please make it happen
Looks like Shy and Thresh had a love child. Not a bad thing in this case haha. Honestly it's awesome except I wouldn't change her face to a skull. Just have her normal face, just all ghostly-like.
nice skin, but to me it really just looks like a glorified Thresh....like if Thresh had a wife....I dunno
Thresh already has a wife. :^)
ohhhhhhhhhh shots fired lmao
{{champion:236}} {{item:3070}}
***A*** wife. Lots of emphasis there.
Instabuy :D
Make this a thing. Please.
Holy molly that's epic. I will so buy that.
That is cool +100 upvotes Riot please.
Fucking love itt!!!! Rito please!
It's a great idea, but the thing is, Shyvana isn't from the shadow isles, i would suggest renaming it to Ghostfire or Undying Flame
Ghostfire would be good
Yes please. Soulwyrm Shyvana!
OOOOOO! Soulwyrm is a great name to add to that concept.
Definitely love Soulfire better than Shadow Isles.
I just keep coming back to this post to look at that skin... damn.
Harrowing 2015, do it.

I would buy this skin in a heartbeat. I don't buy skins, but I would buy this. That shade of green is my absolute favorite color, and shyvana is my favorite champion.  Riot if you make anything happen make this happen.

Thanks everyone, glad you all like it.

If skeletons arent allowed, I think it should be possible to give the dragon a more ghost like look and design the elements as flying armor or scales instead of bones, or at least make it undefineable.
it's really good spooky dragon spirit < 3
YESSSSSS...... RIOT........ DOOOOOO......ITTTTTTTT.......... (plz) :)

This can't be done because it interferes with League Of Legends' lor-

Nevermind this is cool
You could drop this as Legendary and I still wouldn't be able to mash the 'Buy' button fast enough.

#Thresh's Skin Line:

> 
* (new) **Soul Reaver Shyvanna**
* Soul Reaver Draven
* Soul Stealer Vladimir
* wife stealer thresh


#Mordekaiser's Skin Line:

> * All those Harrowing skins
I remember posting this a while ago. Glad to see it still gets attention.
Riot make this skin happen this Harrowing! Plz!!!

#Soul Reaver Draven
http://lol.esportspedia.com/w/images/thumb/1/18/Draven_1.jpg/200px-Draven_1.jpg

Soul Reaver skin hype?
I completely agree with this skin concept
Holy fuck this is amazing
Dread Fire sounds badass.

Looks decent. Not immediately sold on it, but I guess it could grow on me. I like the idea of a green Shyvana skin. I like the idea of it being ethereal-looking. What I don't think will make sense is if it's ghost-oriented. Maybe it could be element oriented, or some other incendiary-related skin. Shyvana is a dragon, after all.

I like the current color palette. The human form might need to have solid bones with surrounding light-green special effects, the same way the dragon form has the darker bones with the lighter green surroundings.

Another idea: what if it's ghostly armor, instead of a ghostly Shyvana? This would preserve her character's identity while giving her that ghostly green feel.
Oooooo spooky  but cool skin I like the flames on Shyvana

This is amazing! Would buy even though i have ice drake!

+1

Yeah, I have the ice drake skin and the bone-themed one, can't remember the name. I just like to call it the Cruella Deville skin (something about the hair.....I know I'm crazy).

This skin concept needs to be a thing.
boneclaw :P
yes omg please riot :D Shyv is my fav and main champ, this would be amazing!
